speaker: alSimon
text: Well well, looks like you're in trouble.

speaker: player
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: Yes. First question: who are you?

speaker: player
text: No, not really, you can take my stuff.

speaker: alSimon
text: There's a trick, isn't it? You're not actually going to give us control over the ship. It wouldn't be that simple.

speaker: alSimon
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: Of course not, you dummy :) I'm going to kill both of you if you don't give this up real quick.

speaker: player
text:
There are no tricks here. You have bested me.
(to AiAssistant: i'm trying to buy some time for you to find who these people are working for, can you manage that for me?)

speaker: aiAssistant
text:
Unlikely.

There isn't really a way to hack their system, it's completely closed off. I might try some of their public channels, give me a second.

speaker: aiAssistant
text: (to you:) I sent a fake business inquiry to one of their business channels, which was poorly encrypted. I have their info. Their real names are Alexia Jones and Ludwig Bohm. They seem to work for some shady smuggling organization. Don't know the name, we don't have that in our datafiles.

speaker: alSimon
text: Okay, power down your system. All of them.

speaker: player
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: Okay, powering down the systems.

speaker: player
text: Wait a second, I won't have any oxygen left if I do that. I must keep the reactor on at least for that.

speaker: player
text: You know what? Screw you, you asked for a fight, you'll have it.

speaker: alSimon
text: Don't be silly, your ship has enough oxygen to last you for days.

speaker: alSimon
text: You couldn't win that fight.

speaker: alSimon
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: Let's bet.

speaker: player
text: You're correct

speaker: bettySimon
text:
Okay look, my boyfriend is a bit hot-headed, and, to be honest, we really need the supplies. There is no reason for us to fight and kill us all.

This can all be done in a peaceful and civilized manner. No one will get hurt, and we all come out happier out of this.

Will you cooperate now? This is your last chance for a peaceful resolution.

speaker: alSimon
text: Okay then, power down your system. All of them.

speaker: alSimon
text: We are the ones asking questions here.

speaker: alSimon
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: I thought you wanted something from me, now you're gonna ask questions?

speaker: player
text: I don't think you understand the rules of conversation.

speaker: alSimon
text:
This is an interrogation, so do I need to remind you that you're playing with your life here?

Give us control over your ship and quit the bullshit.

speaker: player
text: You can get in a shuttle and come in, maybe I'll let you in.

speaker: player
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: Okay, what is it you want me to do?

speaker: player
text: I like this playing-with-my-life game, let's talk some more.

speaker: alSimon
text: (to betty) I'll lose it if she doesn't stop this...

speaker: alSimon
text: I want you to power down all your systems. Including the reactor.

speaker: aiAssistant
text: (to you:) While you were distracting them, I sent a fake business inquiry to one of their business channels, which was poorly encrypted. I have their info. Their real names are Alexia Jones and Ludwig Bohm. They seem to work for some shady smuggling organization. Don't know the name, we don't have that in our datafiles.

speaker: player
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: That's great, and what now? Fight or flee?

speaker: player
text: That doesn't tell us much at all. Can you find more?

speaker: player
text: Report it to the authorities. They'll catalogue their identities, if they ever come up again somewhere.

speaker: aiAssistant
text: My recommendation is to flee to the nearest ultraport beacon, they'll have a hard time figuring out where we went.

speaker: dummyCaptain
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: I think I could take them on. They seem inexperienced and have poor self-control.

speaker: player
text: Agree. Let's flee, i'll skip somewhere by an asteroid and we'll make the homerun just fine.

speaker: aiAssistant
text: I don't recommend that.

speaker: player
text: You should learn to trust me.

speaker: aiAssistant
text: I trust my prediction algorithm, that's my job.

speaker: player
text: And I trust my instincts, and i'm going for it. they won't expect it.

speaker: player
text: I don't have time for this, I'm on a mission.

speaker: alSimon
text: A mission, huh. What kind?

speaker: alSimon
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: To find out who kidnapped the Princess.

speaker: player
text: That is top secret, I can't tell you even if I wanted to.

speaker: player
text: None of your business.

speaker: alSimon
text:
Not our business?... hah. You seem to be placing the state interests above your own life... Sad.

Look, tell us and we won't let anyone know, and maybe, just maybe, you get to keep your life, after being so disrespectful to us anyways, I'm not sure the chance is high.

speaker: alSimon
text: Is that... true?

speaker: bettySimon
text: That would be wild. I'm sure Crown's enemies would be delighted to know..

speaker: bettySimon
text: Lorem Ipsum

speaker: player
text: I was just joking, it's a regular old boring diplomatic mission with no consequences.

speaker: player
text: I wasn't actually serious.

speaker: player
text: Yes, it's true, unfortunately.

speaker: player
text: Yes

speaker: alSimon
text:
People will pay us a fortune for this. I can't believe someone kidnapped that kid. Well, thank you for that information, and... where were we?

I'll be blunt, we're two space pirates who are not afraid to risk their lives to get what they want. And right now, we really want your cargo.

text: I don't trust you. Prove that you won't kill me.

text: You have our word. There's nothing more you can ask for, being in your position. Let's begin

text:
No no no... no fighting. Okay?

We really need that cargo and Ada really needs her life, how about we do a little trade and nobody gets hurt?
